body_html: @AlphasCodes Guys, I apologize for perhaps naive question but why is this build AMD GPU only ? Isn't OpenCL supposed to be standard ? Do I understand it correctly that it won't work on my Intel Carbon X1 with installed OpenCL 2.0 drivers ?
